api_list.name: GST-v2
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a GSTIN (GST number), including the latest return filing list, return filing status, GST compliance classification, and HSN/SAC codes.

required_parameters.name: gstnumber
required_parameters.description: Enter the 15-digit GST Number to be verified.

required_parameters.name: clientid
required_parameters.description: Client ID for the API request.

required_parameters.name: txn_id
required_parameters.description: A random transaction ID for tracking the request.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The method to be used for verification.

required_parameters.name: consent
required_parameters.description: Consent to share the GST number for verification.
